member.name: NMTRBTHUMBPOSCHANGING
member.summary: Contains information about a trackbar change notification. This message is sent with the TRBN_THUMBPOSCHANGING notification.

member.name: NMTRBTHUMBPOSCHANGING.hdr
member.summary: A structure that describes the notification.

member.name: NMTRBTHUMBPOSCHANGING.nReason
member.summary: Type of movement as one of the following values: TB_LINEUP, TB_LINEDOWN, TB_PAGEUP, TB_PAGEDOWN, TB_THUMBPOSITION, TB_THUMBTRACK, TB_TOP, TB_BOTTOM, or TB_ENDTRACK.
